cause.description:
To support the Christians of Egypt and Sudan in order to meet their most basic needs, so they may lead healthy and dignified lives while ultimately learning to sustain themselves.
1. To aid Egyptian and Sudanese Christians
cause.mission: To further the gospel of Jesus Christ educating, inspiring, and mobilizing individuals to bring lasting support and change to the impoverished people of Egypt and Sudan
cause.name: Agape Jubilee Inc.
